messages.speech: I'm here to help! You can ask me to show the menu, add items, check your cart, or place an order. What would you like to do? 🤖
Happy to assist! I can help you browse our menu, manage your cart, and place orders. Just tell me what you need! 😊
Need assistance? I can show you our menu, help you order, check your cart status, and more! How can I help? 💁‍♀️
I'm your ordering assistant! Ask me about our menu, add/remove items, check your order, or get help anytime! 🍽️
